item.title: Syntax Highlighting
item.description: This project extends Neural Transition-based dependeny Parsing (Stanford U cs224n A#2 Q2). The goal is to build a three layer neural network using TensorFlow to parse the dependency structure of sentences. The orignal code contributed by hankcs is built in Python2. I revised it so it runs in Python3. The training data for the neural dependency parser model is Penn Treebank, and each sentence has â€˜word
